meditations.title: Stress Relief
meditations.description: A gentle breathing practice to calm your mind, slow your heart rate, and reset your inner peace.
instructions: If thoughts come, let them pass

meditations.title: Sleep Meditation
meditations.description: A soothing journey to help you drift off into a peaceful and restorative sleep.
instructions: Lie down in a comfortable position
Allow your body to feel heavy
Welcome the feeling of deep rest

meditations.title: Confidence Boost
meditations.description: Empower yourself with positive affirmations to build self-esteem and inner strength.
instructions: Place a hand on your heart
Repeat the affirmations aloud or in your mind
Feel the truth in the words

meditations.title: Aura Cleanse
meditations.description: A visualization practice to cleanse your energy field and restore your inner glow.
instructions: Close your eyes and visualize a light around you
Breathe in positivity, breathe out dullness
Emerge with a vibrant, clear aura

meditations.title: Self-Love Healing
meditations.description: A compassionate meditation to cultivate kindness and acceptance towards yourself.
instructions: Place both hands on your heart

meditations.title: Focus & Study Calm
meditations.description: Sharpen your concentration and find a calm state of mind for effective studying or work.
instructions: Sit upright at your desk or workspace
Set a clear intention for your work
Use the audio as a focus anchor
